about_the_game:
The New Rome is a turn-based strategy game that invites you to shape an alternate history as an architect. Merge ancient grandeur with steampunk innovation as you construct monumental buildings, manage resources, and outwit rivals to become The New Rome’s most renowned architect.

Inspired by the rich history of Roman architecture, The New Rome combines city-building, resource management with chill competitive gameplay. Step into a world where an early industrial revolution transforms the era, presenting you with new challenges and opportunities.


Build Your Marble-punk Rome:
Create impressive monuments blending ancient Roman architecture with steampunk innovation.

Use your architectural expertise to build a wide variety of buildings, from simple dwellings to grand bathhouse complexes.

Make strategic and aesthetic building choices that pave your path to fame



Strategic Resource Management:
Expertly manage resources and worker placement to out-build your rivals.

Gather essential resources like wood, limestone, clay and marble to advance your building projects.

Manage and upgrade your base to expand your production.


Shape Your City’s Transformation:
Immerse yourself in the detailed 3D world, from the bustling city streets to the quiet resource-rich landscapes.

Feel a sense of ownership as the city expands and transforms, reflecting your decisions and aesthetic preferences.

Unlock new building configurations and upgrades through the development of the city.



Face Off Against Rival Builders
Compete against other architects in single-player or multiplayer mode.

Engage in strategic confrontations through the suspenseful simultaneous turns system.

Spread rumours, bribe workers, and use intrigue to undermine your competitors.



Dynamic Reputation System:
Build ties with the city’s powerful Houses to gain patrons and influence.

Political influence helps you to secure more funding and keep an edge over your rivals.



Wishlist Now on Steam!
Can you rise to the challenge and build The New Rome as the world has never seen?

Join Our Community:
The New Rome is a passion project from a dedicated development team. We value your feedback and encourage you to share your thoughts, ideas, and criticisms. Help us shape the game and create an unforgettable experience together with us.
